SEARCH
Package gw.api.desktop

Class DesktopCounts

java.lang.Object
gw.api.desktop.DesktopCounts
public class DesktopCounts extends Object
Utility class used to track and cache the current user's Desktop-related statistics.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    int
    getActiveSubrogations()
    Returns count of current user's owned active subrogations on the Desktop.
    int
    getActivities()
    Returns count of current user's open activities (excluding assignment review activities) on the Desktop.
    int
    getAwaitingAssignment()
    Returns count of activities awaiting assigment (including the current user's assignment review activities).
    int
    getClaims()
    Returns count of current user's open claims on the Desktop.
    static DesktopCounts
    getDesktopCounts()
    Returns a handle to the DesktopCounts from which statistics for the Desktop can be retrieved.
    int
    getExposures()
    Returns count of current user's open exposures on the Desktop.
    int
    getQueues()
    Returns total count of available queues for current user.

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      Returns a handle to the DesktopCounts from which statistics for the Desktop can be retrieved.
